subject: Fwd: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TODAY):
$392,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://fastmarelous.com/
